definition: the position of greatest importance or advancement
details:
noun
- the position of greatest importance or advancement
= example: the position of greatest importance or advancement
= synonyms: cutting edge
- the leading units moving at the head of an army
= example: the leading units moving at the head of an army
= synonyms: van
- any creative group active in the innovation and application of new concepts and techniques in a given field, especially in the arts
= example: any creative group active in the innovation and application of new concepts and techniques in a given field, especially in the arts
= synonyms: avant-garde
